I/We agree that by submitting a PDF generated by PASS I am/we are confirming that I/we have checked the PDF and that it correctly represents my/our submission.
I agree that by submitting a PDF generated by PASS I am confirming that I have checked the PDF and that it correctly represents my submission.
We agree that by submitting a PDF generated by PASS we are confirming that we have checked the PDF and that it correctly represents our submission.
Timeout property {0,number} found in resources file. This will override any default or user supplied setting.

Something went wrong while testing the application. Please check the PDF file.
Something went wrong while testing the application.

ASCII mode set but non-ASCII character U+{0} detected.

File ''{0}'' has been tagged as a PDF document but it doesn''t have .pdf extension. This will cause LaTeX to fail if it''s included so it will only be attached. Please ensure that the file is a valid PDF file or it may cause a problem when extracting the attachment.

File ''{0}'' has been tagged as a Word document but it doesn''t have .doc or .docx extension. Please ensure that the file is a valid Word document or it may cause a problem when extracting the attachment.

Can''t fetch ''{0}''. It''s possible you''re trying to access a file across SSL/TCP but you don''t have the certificate listed in your Java cacerts file. If you have an old version of Java you may find that upgrading it resolves the issue. Otherwise you will need to add the required certificate.
Unable to access ''{0}''. HTTP response code: {1,number,integer}.
